vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake vanilla crazy cake
Entertaining difficult no bugs and a humorous story.
i love the playing with the pietertje2001

If you have a Steam account you NEED to own Portal 2. This game is the embodiment of the platform itself at this point and nearly flawless. Levels are crafted masterfully and the physics/game mechanics are executed unbelievably well. The humor is awesome and ages extremely well, and the graphics don't look that dated even a decade after release. Portal is an iconic series and Portal 2 is by far one of the most iconic games ever made.

so this game is a masterpiece. not only did i get it at a very low price (arround 660 clp) but it comes with the dlc's (like the co-op and such). it has a grat playability and one of the things i enjoy more is that it has full controller support

Pasado de burguer, ya me lo voy a pasar todas las veces que pueda jajaja
I would recommend this, not challenging but fun puzzles. Great story, Coop mode is cool.

Great Money Maker!

Fist off this is a great game and is very funny and re-playable, its a good money maker because a freind of mine and I betted 2 cents on who will beat the game first. A ENTIRE 2 CENTS, a real cash grab for the pickings. They got sick in the middle and gave up and now im 2 cents richer.

Sometimes I remember there's a sign in this game that says "In case of an implosion, look directly at implosion" and I hope whoever was responsible for adding that sign to the game is doing well these days.

Also Pickle Rick is clearly a rip-off of potato Glados change my mind.

Very fun puzzle game. Makes you think about the room and how everything interacts, and there are a lot of mechanics that are fun to interact with. And it has a neat, funny, emotional, story that's a little "icing on the cake" you could say.

This game is soooooooo.ooooooo good! The zeros represent how many hours I have on this game! (At time of writing this) The story, A perfectly designed villian. Please if you haven't played Portal or Portal 2 GET THE GAMES. Also once you finished the game there is a Co-op with is so epic. So please get the game its a gaming experience witch you won't forget.
